price: Dhugumatti, warra Rabbiin sodaataniif Gooftaa isaanii bira Jannata qananiitu jira.
arabic: إِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: inna lil'muttaqīna ʿinda rabbihim jannāti al-naʿīmi
